name: EXPAND BRAIN
description:
POSSIBLE EPILEPSY WARNING - there are fast moving things.

In this puzzle game you input a sequence of variable tokens which is then permuted in various ways by a convoluted machine.Your task is to figure out how the machine works and get the target sequence shown at the bottom.Since there are infinite levels,see how many you solve-in a row or in total.

This is my first semi-serious attempt at gamedev.

INSTRUCTIONS:
-GAME
Control everything with the mouse.
The tutorial is for figuring out how individual parts/mechanics work

-EDITOR
It's a bit fiddly,but the workflow is like this:
-Select desired length at the bottom left
-Construct a path by swapping the numbers at the bottom middle by clicking two of them-Their position means that the path going from position N goes to the node shown at that position.The path should begin on the first node and stop at the last one.
-Select the rules by clicking on the nodes.You can modify the conditions of the rule (the little versions of the token shown in the rule visualization) by clicking them.
-Select the pattern at the bottom.
-PLAY the level to make sure it's finishable.If not,iterate.
-SHARE the level.
